operations.notes:
Creates a new bucket inside Smart Canvas.

This operation requires the scopes: 'smartcanvas.canvas.write'.

parameters.name: x-client-id
parameters.description: Client ID required to make this API call

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: Access token

parameters.name: x-suppress-response-codes
parameters.description: If 'true', the HTTP response is always 200. Default = 'false'

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Bucket mnemonic

parameters.name: contextPattern
parameters.description: Context pattern (regex) to which this bucket should be visible. Example = /highlights

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale for which this bucket should be visible. If ommited, will be visible to all locales.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query term or mnemonic to be used to get content for this bucket.

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: The position that this bucket should be placed. First position = 1. If ommited, Smart Canvas will append to the end of the context.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Bucket title. This value supports i18n.

parameters.name: titleAlign
parameters.description: Bucket title alignment (center, right or left).

parameters.name: bgcolor
parameters.description: Background color (example = #00FAB3)

parameters.name: bgimage
parameters.description: Background image (URL) for this bucket

parameters.name: canvasStrategy
parameters.description: Bucket Canvas mnemonic to render this bucket

parameters.name: highlightFirstCard
parameters.description: If the first card should be highlighted or not

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of cards to be shown in this bucket.

parameters.name: jsonExtendedData
parameters.description: Extended data (JSON format) for this bucket

responseMessages.message: See Response Codes for all response and error codes
